CustomField.formula: OR( Temp_Is_CreditReview_Completed__c , AND ( NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT(Worst_Collectability_Credit_by_Pefindo_d__c) )), NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT(Is_Take_Over__c) )), NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT(Jenis_Penggunaan_Dana__c) )), NOT( ISBLANK(Loan_Information__r.Account.Primary_Contact__r.Profession__c )), NOT( ISBLANK(Living_Cost__c )), NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT(Survey__r.Model_Hak_Tanggungan__c)) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Is CreditReview Completed
